summary: Ten people who agree to take the same lucrative "job" find themselves locked in an underground complex and forced to play a murder game for seven days.
cast: Kin'ya Kitaôji|Nagisa Katahira|Shinji Takeda|Masanori Ishii|Tsuyoshi Abe|Tatsuya Fujiwara|Aya Hirayama|Haruka Ayase|Satomi Ishihara|Takurô Ôno|Yûki Himura|Yusuke Kojima|Saori Hada|Shinnosuke Kazama|Keisuke Konno|Yûki Furukawa|Daisuke Kikuta
keywords: part time job|job|looking for a job|limousine|stranger
title: Inshite miru: 7-kakan no desu gêmu
